verses.verse: Cast <WH7971> your bread <WH3899> upon <WH6440> the waters <WH4325>: for you shall find <WH4672> it after many <WH7230> days <WH3117>.
Give <WH5414> a portion <WH2506> to seven <WH7651>, and also to eight <WH8083>; for you know <WH3045> not what evil <WH7451> shall be upon the earth <WH776>.

If the clouds <WH5645> be full <WH4390> of rain <WH1653>, they empty <WH7324> themselves upon the earth <WH776>: and if the tree <WH6086> fall <WH5307> toward the south <WH1864>, or toward the north <WH6828>, in the place <WH4725> where the tree <WH6086> falls <WH5307>, there it shall be <WH1933>.
He that observes <WH8104> the wind <WH7307> shall not sow <WH2232>; and he that regards <WH7200> the clouds <WH5645> shall not reap <WH7114>.

As you know <WH3045> not what is the way <WH1870> of the spirit <WH7307>, nor how the bones <WH6106> do grow in the womb <WH990> of her that is with child <WH4392>: even so you know <WH3045> not the works <WH4639> of God <WH430> who makes all <WH6213>.

In the morning <WH1242> sow <WH2232> your seed <WH2233>, and in the evening <WH6153> withhold <WH3240> not your hand <WH3027>: for you know <WH3045> not whether <WH335> shall prosper <WH3787>, either this or that <WH8147>, or whether they both shall be alike <WH259> good <WH2896>.
Truly the light <WH216> is sweet <WH4966>, and a pleasant <WH2896> thing it is for the eyes <WH5869> to behold <WH7200> the sun <WH8121>:

But if a man <WH120> live <WH2421> many <WH7235> years <WH8141>, and rejoice <WH8055> in them all <WH2142>; yet let him remember the days <WH3117> of darkness <WH2822>; for they shall be many <WH7235>. All that comes <WH935> is vanity <WH1892>.

Rejoice <WH8055>, O young man <WH970>, in your youth <WH3208>; and let your heart <WH3820> cheer <WH2895> you in the days <WH3117> of your youth <WH979>, and walk <WH1980> in the ways <WH1870> of your heart <WH3820>, and in the sight <WH4758> of your eyes <WH5869>: but know <WH3045> you <WH430>, that for all these things God will bring <WH935> you into judgment <WH4941>.
Therefore remove <WH5493> sorrow <WH3708> from your heart <WH3820>, and put away <WH5674> evil <WH7451> from your flesh <WH1320>: for childhood <WH3208> and youth <WH7839> are vanity <WH1892>.
